
---
title: "example_texreg"
author: "Dale Steele"
date: "March 13, 2015"
output: html_document
---


```{r}
library(MASS)
data(menarche)
m <- glm(cbind(Menarche, Total-Menarche) ~ 
           Age, family=binomial(logit), data=menarche)
summary(m)
```

Use texreg to make beautiful table.

```{r, results='asis'}
library(texreg)

htmlreg(m, file = "mytable.doc", caption="Age at Menarche", inline.css = TRUE, doctype = TRUE, html.tag = TRUE,                                                     head.tag = TRUE, body.tag = TRUE, ci.force=TRUE, ci.test=NULL,bold=TRUE)
htmlreg(m)
```
